name: federally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is part of a federal system (= one that consists of a group of regions that are controlled by a central government): These matters are now dealt with federally. Federally funded research in this area has produced some extremely promising results.
More examplesFewer examplesA drug that has been approved federally may still be prescribed or administered incorrectly at regional level.There are more than 550 federally recognized Native American tribes in the United States.All US petrochemical plants are inspected federally.
